backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing user profiles and trading data with access control, supporting capital/target updates and trade recording.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features to files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten short summaries of frontend source files for reference or documentation.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and custom OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component handling authentication state, layout, theming, and rendering the trading dashboard.
frontend/src/components/AuthControls.tsx: Login/logout button managing Internet Identity authentication with toast feedback.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal prompting authenticated users without profiles to enter and save their name.
frontend/src/features/trading/components: UI for editing trading capital, validating input, and saving via authenticated mutation or session state.
Provides preset investment buttons and a custom input field to select an investment amount.
Displays key trading metrics such as capital, profit, loss, and remaining target using formatted cards.
Button with confirmation dialog to reset all trading data via mutation or session reset.
UI for editing target profit, showing remaining target and saving changes via mutation or session state.
Component for recording a trade by selecting investment and outcome, with validation and profit/loss preview.
Renders a sortable table of past trades with timestamps, outcomes, and profit/loss values.
frontend/src/features/trading/hooks/useT: React Query hooks for fetching and mutating trading data, including capital, target, trades, resets, and user profiles.
frontend/src/features/trading/state/useT: Zustand store managing trading capital, targets, trade history, and profit/loss updates with win/loss logic.
frontend/src/features/trading/TradingDas: Main trading view that loads metrics, editors, trade entry, history, and reset controls based on auth status.
frontend/src/features/trading/utils/trad: Utility functions for calculating win profit/returns, target remaining, and currency formatting.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages a backend actor tied to the current Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provider and hooks for managing Internet Identity login state, stored identities, and auth-client behavior.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus custom CSS variables defining light and dark theme color tokens and layout settings.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry that sets up React Query, Internet Identity provider, and renders the main App component.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers to read, persist, and clear URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining themes, colors, typography, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing scope, features, architecture notes, and versioned requirements for the trading app.
